tweet: Excited to welcome new Reps. Lee, Cisneros, Rouda, Dean, Morelle, Mucarsel-Powell, Phillips, Underwood & McBath to the Gun Violence Prevention Task Force! Proud to have their voices as the new majority works to pass legislation to help keep our communities safe from gun violence.

Survivors deserve this peace of mind as they recover.
